article_title: 'We are surrounded': Guarding the Middle East's most dangerous border
sentence: The  Gaza  war  that  started  after  Hamas  attacked  on  7  October,  killing  around  1,200  Israelis,  mostly  civilians,  has  been  devastating.

article_title: 'We are surrounded': Guarding the Middle East's most dangerous border
sentence: The  Israeli  offensive  that  followed  has,  so  far,  killed  well  over  27,000  Palestinians,  mostly  civilians,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  and  inflicted  severe  damage  on  Gaza.
